name: WildStar: Cute & Cuddly Pack
detailed_description:
Take a moment out of your busy schedule shooting aliens and strip-mining the planet for natural resources to enjoy the cute and cuddly things in life! This bundle is scientifically designed to illicit the rare “D’awww!” response, and raise vocal octaves into a range that usually only dogs can hear.

This bundle contains ALL of the following items:
Housing plot addition:
• Birdhouse
• Pink Comfy Cushion x4 (décor)
Pets:
• Trask Tenderling
• Pebbleback
Mounts:
• Snarfelynx
• GlitterKitty Cruiser

short_description: Take a moment out of your busy schedule shooting aliens and strip-mining the planet for natural resources to enjoy the cute and cuddly things in life!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP SP3 (32-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Core2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Phenom™ X3 2.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® 8800 GT, ATI® Radeon® HD 4850, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista® (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Quad Core 2.66GHz or better, AMD Phenom™ II X4 3GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, Radeon® HD 5830, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
